description: Number of partitions in parts not of the form 17k, 17k+1 or 17k-1. Also number of partitions with no part of size 1 and differences between parts at distance 7 are greater than 1.
references: G. E. Andrews, The Theory of Partitions, Addison-Wesley, 1976, p. 109.
